content: We are looking forward to collaborating as we begin testing RTPBC at the upcoming Connectathon. Track page here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=58654805
@Patrick Murta and @Pooja Babbrah are helping to lead this track at the Connectathon in Atlanta this weekend
Is there a sample GoodRx API Key we can use for requests?
is this track creating any AuditEvent or Provenance records? I am working on an app that consumes AuditEvent and would like to find some.
@John Moehrke - it is not. We are working on pulling patient out of pocket and cash price for a patients medication

Sign-up is open now for the upcoming December Connectathon. The Connectathon will take place at the New Wave office located at 2270 Rolling Run Drive, Suite 400, Windsor Mill, MD 21244 on December 9 and 10. The sign up can be found here: http://bit.ly/DC-Connectathon-SignUp

Sign-up is open now for the upcoming December Connectathon. The Connectathon will take place at the New Wave office located at 2270 Rolling Run Drive, Suite 400, Windsor Mill, MD 21244 on December 9 and 10. The sign up can be found here: http://bit.ly/DC-Connectathon-SignUp

Thanks @Pooja Babbrah. To add to her post, there is no fee to attend the Connectathon and you do not have to be a member of CARIN to participate. Any developer who is a data holder or a consumer-facing app can join until we run out of space. If you have any questions, please let either myself or @Mark Roberts know.
